name: MIX'D
description:
MIX'D is a memory game inspired by the principles of Colour Theory.

Each of the 10 levels hides pairs of the three primary colours: Yellow, Red and Blue. Select two tiles to discover the mix of the colours they hide. Complete the level by removing all pairs of the same colour from the board.



“The highest goal that man can achieve is amazement”

― Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Theory of Colours
